s1.name: mindc documentation
s1.p: mindc is a modular and extensible architecture compilation tool-chain that can be used to compile component-based applications from their architectural descriptions (ADL files).

s2.name: User Guide
s2.p: The mindc User Guide gives a description of:

ul.li: the ADL and IDL languages used to describe the architecture of an application;
the coding conventions that must be followed in the C code,
the use of the mindc tool-chain.

s2.p: This document is available in multiple versions:

s2.name: Technical documentation
s2.p: The mindc Technical documentation contains various generated reports based on the mindc source code. It includes javadoc, highlighted source-code, test-coverage and various maven reports

s1.name: Reference Documentation
s1.p: The specification of the Fractal component model is presented in the The Fractal Component Model document.

s1.name: Mailing List
s1.p: Questions, comments, ideas, etc. related to MIND can be posted on the MIND mailing list.
